Fixed in AsynchronousTreeViewer. Cell editors are disposed/recerated as needed, we don't attempt to re-use them anymore. As well, setting cell editors/modifier is no longer API as it is controlled by the IColumnEditor.
*** Bug 131929 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Looks like a dup of bug 132044.
